I'm trying out some interesting ideas for some scenarios i'd like to make for the community. I'd like a flag of the XCOM Logo from XCOM: Enemy Unknown on a black (holographic, perhaps?) background for this project.

Thanks a lot.

At risk of pissing off Valve and Cave Johnson, I'd love a "verbalized" Aperture Science logo type flag. Maybe a stylized kerbalnaut head inside the ring or something, on a baby blue background. If you can get something like that together sometime, it would be awesome!

At risk of pissing off Valve and Cave Johnson, I'd love a "verbalized" Aperture Science logo type flag. Maybe a stylized kerbalnaut head inside the ring or something, on a baby blue background. If you can get something like that together sometime, it would be awesome!

I don't really understand what do you mean by "verbalized" Aperture Science logo. Tell me if you want any modifications.

Sorry for my grammar skills, by this i mean put Kerbal hands instead of human one but if that's to hard you can just leave it

Ok, that's what I was thinking. I'll try making something good, I need to resize it to fit with flag's panorama resolution.

Could you maybe put this logo, or something similar (you know, in the style of the 'alliance' eagle), on a flag canvas so it actually looks like a flag, with 'K.S.A.' in white blockletters above it?

(My apologies for the large image)

Can someone make a Flag like this but this kerbal hand and it saying MOAR at the top and BOOSTERS at the bottom. http://image.shutterstock.com/display_pic_with_logo/548344/103390106/stock-photo-workers-resistance-poster-hands-holding-hammer-and-sickle-workers-resistance-design-workers-103390106.jpg

(I meant to type "Kerbalzed" but my iPad autocorrect got me and I didn't notice.)

Could someone make a me a flag to go with my company banner? I'm happy with the banner but I'm still looking for a logo that encapsulates Wayfare AE&KA into a single image. My thought:

In white on "blueprint"-blue (without gridlines): a rocket (aerospace) orbiting a construction crane (engineering) which is lifting a toaster (kitchen appliances). No text please.

I know it's corny to quote myself but this thread seems to be well alive today so I figured I'd see if there are any takers

I actually need a mission patch/logo/flag. I really don't know what I want it to look like so I'll just say get creative. For reference, the patchflag/logo is for a ship named the Lazarus II. I lost the Lazarus I back in .20.2 and have a pic of it. This is it in tanker configuration:

Also, this is my flag, just so you can see my style of stuff. If you feel like adding wavy flag effects to this, go ahead but I don't need it.

EDIT: Sorry about the huge images. Wish spoiler tags still worked.
thank you yogui87 thats just what i wanted.
